languages.text: "Иеронимус заслужил строгую епитимью, но не казнь. Накажи его иначе".
"Hieronymus deserves a harsh penance, but not an execution. Give him a different punishment."
languages.original_text: "Иеронимус заслужил строгую епитимью, но не казнь. Накажи его иначе".

traits.locale_text: "Hieronymus deserves a harsh penance but not an execution. Give him a different punishment."
"Hieronymus deserves a harsh penance but not an execution. Give him a different punishment."
"Hieronymus deserves a harsh penance, but not an execution. Give him a different punishment."
"Hieronymus deserves a harsh penance, but not an execution. Give him a different punishment."
"Hieronymus deserves a harsh penance, but not an execution. Give him a different punishment."
"Hieronymus deserves a harsh penance, but not an execution. Give him a different punishment."

languages.text: “希罗尼穆斯理当受到严厉的惩罚，但他罪不至死，给他个别的惩罚吧。”
languages.original_text: "Hieronymus deserves a harsh penance, but not an execution. Give him a different punishment."

traits.locale_text: “希罗尼穆斯理当受到严厉的惩罚，但他罪不至死，给他个别的惩罚吧。”

languages.text: 「ヒエロニムスは厳しい処罰を受けるべきだ。だが、処刑ではいけない。何か別の罰を与えよ」
languages.original_text: "Hieronymus deserves a harsh penance, but not an execution. Give him a different punishment."

traits.locale_text: 「ヒエロニムスは厳しい処罰を受けるべきだ。だが、処刑ではいけない。何か別の罰を与えよ」

languages.text: «Hieronymus merece una dura penitencia, no una ejecución. Déle un castigo distinto».
languages.original_text: "Hieronymus deserves a harsh penance, but not an execution. Give him a different punishment."

traits.locale_text: «Hieronymus merece una dura penitencia, no una ejecución. Déle un castigo distinto».

languages.text: "Hieronymus verdient eine harte Strafe, aber keine Hinrichtung. Bestraft ihn auf andere Weise."
languages.original_text: "Hieronymus deserves a harsh penance, but not an execution. Give him a different punishment."

traits.locale_text: "Hieronymus verdient eine harte Strafe, aber keine Hinrichtung. Bestraft ihn auf andere Weise."

languages.text: « Hiéronymus mérite un châtiment sévère, mais pas d'être exécuté. »
languages.original_text: "Hieronymus deserves a harsh penance, but not an execution. Give him a different punishment."

traits.locale_text: « Hiéronymus mérite un châtiment sévère, mais pas d'être exécuté. »

languages.text: "Hieronymus, ağır bir cezayı hak etse de cezası idam olmamalı. Ona farklı bir ceza ver."
languages.original_text: "Hieronymus deserves a harsh penance, but not an execution. Give him a different punishment."

traits.locale_text: "Hieronymus ağır bir cezayı hak ediyor ancak idam edilmeyi de hak etmiyor. Ona farklı bir ceza ver."
